CustomField.description: When this field is marked as true, NBA skips evaluation of Served Other Rules when serving a record. This should be marked as TRUE on large rule sets to avoid SOQL limits.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When this field is marked as true, NBA skips evaluation of Served Other Rules when serving a record. This should be marked as TRUE on large rule sets to avoid SOQL limits.
CustomField.label: Exclude Served Other Rules
